channel.title: Shaders on Flavio Franzin
channel.description: Recent content in Shaders on Flavio Franzin

item.title: Vector Data Access Optimization
item.description: video { width: 70%; height: auto; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } #player-overlay { position: absolute; display: none; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #000 z-index:999; } I developed a dynamic structure to optimize access to mass datasets of polygons and polylines, representing areas like forests, lakes, roads, and rivers. This structure accelerated the terrain rendering ーwhich these data are projected by texturingー by +80% on average.
